info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 5:18PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN PORTAGE...NORTHERN TRUMBULL...EASTERN GEAUGA...EAST CENTRAL LAKE...ASHTABULA... SOUTHWESTERN ERIE AND WESTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EST... At 517 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Madison to near Burton to near Mantua. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. Radar indicates that the strongest winds may occur just ahead of these thunderstorms. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Erie, Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Streetsboro, Cortland, Edinboro, Geneva, Madison, Girard, North Kingsville, Middlefield, Garrettsville, Kinsman, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Albion, Burton, Andover, and Mantua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
